column4: anyone know of this bug in nautilus ? i cant seem to delete any items in trash ?
jack_sparrow - the one in the gnome toolbar
i have to go into .local/share/trash/files to delete them
Interesting.. have you run gui apps with sudo etc?
jack sparrow - no , seems to have come about after i upgraded earlier
any interesting changes in your sources.list
sudo apt-get install pastebinit  && cat /etc/apt/sources.list | pastebinit (Provide Pastebin link in channel)
: ive only added the medibuntu repositories
run the command I gave... which release are you running
anyone else having this trash issue ?
I asked what release/distro and I asked you to run a command..  I dint see the answer to either
Did you do some quick editing of that file?  What did you remove..  I dont see medibuntu in their either
- No, havent done any editing in there. strange ... i added medibuntu via the terminal when i installed libscss2
